entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 8:57 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then clearing. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
